title: UN: Almost a fifth of all food ends up in the bin
lead: Nearly 931 million tonnes of food sold to households, retailers, restaurants and other food services was thrown away in 2019

title: Wales unveils circular economy strategy ‘to become world number one’ recycler
lead: The ‘Beyond Recycling’ strategy aims to support a green recovery in Wales as the nation deals with the triple challenge of the pandemic, climate change and Brexit

title: Budget 2021: In summary
lead: The 2021 Budget established how the Conservative Party will work to drive a sustainable and business-focused recovery in the face of the COVID-19 pandemic

title: Jeff Halliwell appointed Chair of the Coal Authority
lead: The Coal Authority is an operational delivery body that manages the effects of past coal mining and is using innovative approaches to decarbonising heat using mine water and mine assets, supporting the UK’s net zero goals

title: Paris takes to two wheels with micromobility pilot programme
lead: The project will see the installation of 150 dock, lock and charge points for e-scooters

title: AfDB greenlights $27m loan for 200MW solar PV plant in Egypt
lead: The project is expected to lower electricity costs for businesses and residents

title: COP26 – ‘Government needs to have clearer ambitions and ways to measure success’
lead: A new report from BEIS has called for more clarity from the UK government to ensure the climate summit can be a success

title: ENA appoints new Chair for Open Networks Project
lead: Mr Sotiris Georgiopoulos, Head of Smart Grid Development at UK Power Networks, will oversee the project’s work and progress

title: Japanese trading house invests in UK CCS project
lead: Acorn CCS project aims to store carbon dioxide emissions in North Sea oil and gas reservoirs

title: Utility Team launches ‘gamechanging’ energy efficiency software
